title: Markdown测试
text: Markdown测试Heading Heading 1Heading 2Heading 3Heading 4Heading 5Heading 6 ItalicsThis text is italicThis test is italic BlodThis text is italicThis text is italic StrikethroughThis text is strikethrough Horizontal Rule Blockquote This is a quote Links, 注意Http必须加上youtubegoogle百度 youtubegoogle百度 UL Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Nested Item 1 Nested Item 2 Nesteded Item 1 OL Item 1 Nested Item 1 Nested Item 2 Item 2 Inline Code Block这printf("Hello, World")代码 Images bash12npm install npm start C123456#include <stdio.h>int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ printf("Hello, World\n"); return 0;} python12def add(num1, num2): return num1 + num2 Tables Name Email Alice Alice@gmail.com Bob Bob@gmail.com Cancan CanCan@gmail.com Task Lists Task 1 Task 2 Task 3

title: Hello World
text: 博客初次建立，可喜可贺😂还有…新年快乐 以下是测试部分1.图片显示测试 2.内置asset folder超链接test图片超链接 3.使用markdown语法显示图片 4.tab形式代码块, 不带高亮#include <stdio.h> int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { printf("Hello, World"); return 0; } 5.内置方式代码块, 带高亮123456#include <stdio.h>int main(int argc, char *argv[]){ printf("Hello, World"); return 0;} 6.外部url链接 Googlehttps://www.google.com Baiduhttps://www.baidu.com 7.外链测试网易云 Youtube如www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rub-JsjMhWY&t=20sRub-JsjMhWY就是video_id Bilibili Soundcloud 8.插件测试aplayer插件测试 var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-wwOfaJmu"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "test", author: "test", url: "test_music_loop.mp3", pic: "", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); html5内置播放器测试 Your browser does not support the webm tag. Your browser does not support the webm tag.
